metadata.title: PICES Scientific Report No. 21 (2002) - PICES-GLOBEC International Program on Climate Change and Carrying Capacity : Report of the PICES Volunteer Observing Ship Workshop / edited by Charles B. Miller
metadata.description:
The PICES MOINTOR Task Team, the PICES Continuous Plankton Record (CPR) Advisory Panel, and the Exxon Valdez Oil Spill Trustee Council's Gulf Ecosystem Monitoring (GEM) program convened a workshop to consider enhanced instrumentation for volunteer observing ships (VOS), particularly instruments to complement CPR data.  

    [ LC Call No. GC781 .P535 no.21.  ISBN 0973149213 ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To report results from PICES workshop held on April 4-5, 2002 in Seattle, Washington, U.S.A.

Status: Complete
